Props to .Dude.
Have to use rzr_launcher to start it, but everything works fine. 
What i did -

1) Install
2) I had to install "OpenALwEAX" and "xLiveRedist" from the Redist folder -yours might be different
3) Try running from the F1 App. I got a steam error, so instead i used the Rzr one, hit esx and a few seconds later it was up and running :D

Hope it helps

.Dude. Its working. Sweet size. you saved my ass and a lot of bandwidth. It is tricky to get it worked. 

First: Download and install openal32.dll from here: http://www.dll-files.com/dllindex/dll-files.shtml?openal32
.
Second: Download and install microsoft windows live from here: http://www.microsoft.com/games/en-us/aboutGFW/pages/gfw3intro.aspx
.
Third: Install the game. Allow to install DirectX and C++ during installation. 
.
Fourth: After install go to the installed folder(C:/ Program files(86)/ Blackbox..) There double click and open the "F1_2011_Launcher" file (with RZR icon). When its open you can see som 8bit videos and wiered music. Press the "Esc" button in your key board and the game will launch. it worked for me. good luck. Thanks seeders. :D
@Hopenhope The files are in the "Redist" folder where the game is installed ;)

Funfando!!! so que o uploader devia colocar o metodo de instalaçao para que as pessoas sem experiencia consigam executar o game corretamente.Ja que ele nao colocou vou colocar:
Emule a iso no Daemaon tools
Execute o instalador 
O jogo vai instalar Rapidamente mas quando terminar a instalação  vai abrir uma janela do CMD prompt de Comando do windows Decodificando os arquivos de audio 
so depois disso clique em next do instalador.
Apos isso abra a pasta redist da iso que voce emulou e instale o Opem AL e o Game for windows live.Nao execute o icone de atalho do desktop va a pasta do jogo e execute o F1_2011_Launcher como ADM no windows 7. E complicado mais vale a pena o game esta muito bom sem lag e isso ai galera façam bom proveito do tutorial  pois eu tive que aprende na marra.
